General.Name: BC MOLY
General.Description: BC Moly Ltd., an exploration stage company, engages in the exploration and development of mineral resource properties in Canada. The company holds a 100% interest in the Storie molybdenum property located in the Liard Mining Division, British Columbia. It also holds interests in various other properties located in Labrador (Newfoundland). The company was formerly known as Columbia Yukon Explorations Inc. and changed its name to BC Moly Ltd. in September 2014. BC Moly Ltd. was incorporated in 1984 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.

0.Name: Mr. Edward Alfred Yurkowski P.Eng., B.Sc.
0.Title: Pres, CEO, CFO, Director, Corp. Sec. & Member of Advisory Board
